name: Exotic Kitchen
description:
game in Brazilian Portuguese
.
controls: left mouse button
get the ingredients by clicking on them. 
To prepare the recipe: click on the ingredients and then the pan to find out the result of your recipe.
.
Call me Duck. This is my first game that was good. My english sucks and I'm still not good at producing games, I'm still in training, so, sorry for any mistakes.
I hope you like it. I always accept suggestions and critcism. Thank you.
